title: How do I remove a champ from fave?

replies.body: I believe you should be able to go into another champion select (I'd suggest the practice tool!) and right click on who you want to remove. The lane that he's picked as a favorite for should now say "Unfavorite".

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=olKpOGEg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-25T03:50:36.471+0000)
>
> I believe you should be able to go into another champion select (I'd suggest the practice tool!) and right click on who you want to remove. The lane that he's picked as a favorite for should now say "Unfavorite".

Oh, thank you BROPORO ;)
